articles.title: Juvenile with ‘airsoft replica weapon’ determined to have caused UMass Lowell lockdown
articles.description:
A large law enforcement response descended on the university's campus Wednesday after reports of a person with a gun.

The post Juvenile with ‘airsoft replica weapon’ determined to have caused UMass Lowell lockdown appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: UMass Lowell experienced a lockdown on September 4 due to a report of a gun.
Law enforcement responded to the scene after a juvenile was found with an airsoft replica weapon.
The incident raised safety concerns among students and faculty on campus.

articles.title: A new BBJ report rejiggers the list of state’s wealthiest zip codes. Here’s who’s on top now.
articles.description:
The top 10 wealthiest zip codes are all reportedly within 10 miles of Boston.

The post A new BBJ report rejiggers the list of state’s wealthiest zip codes. Here’s who’s on top now. appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: New BBJ report ranks the wealthiest zip codes in Massachusetts, all near Boston.
Top 10 wealthiest zip codes are within 10 miles of Boston, highlighting local affluence.
Increased property values may affect housing affordability for Boston residents.

articles.title: Wu admin. to send nearly 100 recent police academy grads to Mass. and Cass
articles.description:
To crack down on outdoor substance use and crime, Boston officials are beefing up the police presence at Mass. and Cass and taking other steps.

The post Wu admin. to send nearly 100 recent police academy grads to Mass. and Cass appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Boston officials are increasing police presence at Mass. and Cass to address outdoor substance use.
Nearly 100 recent police academy graduates will be deployed to the area for enforcement.
This initiative aims to reduce crime and improve safety for Boston residents.
